title: The Making of Featured Game Modes

replies.body:

New urf map! Please Riot.
Plz bring urf back and make it a permanent game mode..
You need More upvote/like
**All I want for Christmas is URF.**
yass
forget the front teeth give me more urf
Bring urf back! Bring urf back!

We all miss urf, but I can only imagine the frustration Riot must feel constantly being told to bring it back, unless of course someone down at rito headquarters is sitting there and twirling his mustache "Will I press the URF button? Hm... not today" {{item:3070}}
Everyone uses random champions like in ARAM? I mean, anything to get it back!
URF PLS!! Rito don't torture us any longer... BRING BACK URF!!
i wholeheartedly agree. PLEASE MAKE URF A PERMANENT GAMEMODE
please make a god damn urf map.
URF PLZ

Urf is love, Urf is life <3 pls bring it back
#{{summoner:10}} {{summoner:12}}
Urf map that just has random manatees swimming around
Urfgot skin confirmed{{champion:6}}

Im all for experimenting and playing new modes, trying different stuff out, but that URF mode was the golden apple that we needed to blow off steam and mess around with after being frustrated and losing too many games. 
it was beautiful.
plz bring urf back

Pretty sure they're just patching it up and trying to make it a bit more stable before bringing it back. However i also can't wait for the return of URF. It reminded me of how riot is constantly trying new ways to please us. Cheers to Riot.
Please bring back URF
Yes please! URF was one of the upmost funnest maps of them all from having the feeling of power. Can you please keep it perminatly?

Hi all,

Wanted to drop in and say we hear how much you loved URF and want it back! As L4t3ncy mentioned at the end of this blog, he'll be talking soon about how the past year's modes went, some cool data insights, successes and challenges, and what we want to achieve in 2015. In that he's going to go into some detail about URF, some of the challenges we faced and what we learned about it which will give some insight on how we chose to create and bring modes back.

Also, it was said in several of the comments but URF will be back, so fear not! A lot goes into planning a mode schedule for a year, but also into making sure when we bring a mode back its not just the same mode, but has had additional development time based on what we learned and want to improve on.

Thanks,
-Chager

> Hi all,
> 
> Wanted to drop in and say we hear how much you loved URF and want it back! As L4t3ncy mentioned at the end of this blog, he'll be talking soon about how the past year's modes went, some cool data insights, successes and challenges, and what we want to achieve in 2015. In that he's going to go into some detail about URF, some of the challenges we faced and what we learned about it which will give some insight on how we chose to create and bring modes back.
> 
> Also, it was said in several of the comments but URF will be back, so fear not! A lot goes into planning a mode schedule for a year, but also into making sure when we bring a mode back its not just the same mode, but has had additional development time based on what we learned and want to improve on.
> 
> Thanks,
> -Chager

But, those of us that Want URF back want it to be back exactly the same, that's the thing. 

As not to speak for anyone else, I feel that most of the game modes were strongest when they were first out and have sort of become less fun or a bit watred down as they have returned.


Hexakill was a lot of fun originally but the 6v6 on Twisted Treeline felt kind of...meh in comparison, maybe a 3 v 3 one for all would have worked better there.

The one for all originally again was good but not as much on the Howling Abyss map.

I've played since 2011 and URF would quite possibly the most fun I have had playing League of Legends, with or without friends joining. I'm of the opinion with some of these games modes "if it ain't broke don't fix it" and while there were a few "OP" so to speak champs in URF, that was okay to me. All the champs were "OP" it was sort of the point of the mode and it was a blast. It would again feel watered down if it came back with tons of changes, some f the features removed, random stuff added to keep champs from being OP etc.

I can back the 6v6 thing. As someone who got to play it back when it was a glitch in the system, when it was announced officially, all I could think was 'Meh, guess i'll play a few games' and never got into it. URF I had fun every game I played, and am excited for it to come back. Dominion/Ascenion, I'd care less If I never see those again. So hearing that they will be changing URF makes me sad really, because I only got to play two games as Sona before she got banned haha (unless the change is to get rid of permabanned champs and incorporate draft-bans) -URF Sona 2015!

PS- Its also disheartening to see that Dominion is still a permanent mode, but something that everyone thoroughly enjoyed is limited to a few appearances a year.

*Inset comment here about begging for URF back.
Guys Riot said they are actually bringing it back but just patching it all up first! They want to make sure it's more even with less bugs. I am so happy for this and can not wait!
Bring URF Back plz

Haha I'm kind of excited about URF coming back too. I think what made URF so fun, is without the subtle balancing of cooldowns, mana costs, etc. You were able to take your favorite champion and really feel powerful. And feeling truely powerful, is something games are lacking now-a-days in the multi-player market.
Only 33% got the perfect ascension icon? I feel special now.
mhm im 66% better than most league playerrs its a proven fact
URF is love URF is life
So URF mode?

Just Make Urf Permanent. It's the best game mode ever!!!!!!!!!! IT'S THE BEST. UNBAN THE BROKEN PEOPLE PLZ. Like nid...Hec...Maokai..
after seeing dunkeys video i want hecarim to stay banned
I'd like to point out that URF will be coming back, it's already been said by Riot.

Riot, it is obvious that a majority of the people who play League of Legends want Ultra Rapid Fire back permanently. I'd say if you didn't want to lose some of your players you should do this. We all want it, and it would make us happy.
